mads.note: Zhang, Hanxiang. Emerging uni-planar microwave circuit and system, 2019: page ii (To the Faculty of Washington State University: The members of the Committee appointed to examine the thesis of Hanxiang Zhang find it satisfactory and recommend that it be accepted. Bayaner Arigong, Ph.D., Chair)

Washington State University (website), viewed June 10, 2020: Directory (Arigong, Bayaner, Assistant Professor, Ece, WSU Vancouver School of Encs, Vecs 201g, Vancouver, WA 98686-9600, bayaner.arigong@wsu.edu)

Wireless Circuit and System Research Lab, Washington State University (website), viewed June 10, 2020: Bayaner Arigong (Dr. Bayaner Arigong is currently an assistant professor at School of Engineering and Computer Science, Washington State University Vancouver. He was born in Ordos, Inner Mongolia and lived there for 17 years. He received the B.S. and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from China University of Geosciences (CUG), Wuhan, China, in 2005 and 2008 respectively, and PhD degree in Computer Science and Engineering from University of North Texas, Denton TX, US, in 2015. Before he joined WSU Vancouver, he worked for Infineon Technologies as Advanced Development RF System Design Engineer, where he involved in RF power amplifier circuit and system design for cellular infrastructure applications.)
